parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Chromecast device.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Network Port
parameter.description: Network port of the Chromecast device.

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh Rate
parameter.description: How often the chromecast should schedule a refresh. The chromecast should notify the binding when something changes, but if you want to track duration you'll need to schedule a refresh more often.
